title: 14.1 Slim Laptop Case
subTitle: A sleek and durable case that features a padded laptop compartment with a strap to keep your laptop secure.
description: A sleek and durable backpack made from weather-resistant material. The backpack features a well-padded laptop compartment to keep devices secure. The cushioned handle and padded back of the bag make it comfortable to carry either way.
keyFeatures: Padded compartment for laptop, quick access pocket for convenience
Large capacity for ample storage space, 21 Liters capacity
Eco-Friendly - RPET materials, 9 bottles count recycled
Pass though access in back for rolling luggage - Perfect for business travel

discriptionExtra.title: Quick access
discriptionExtra.description: Easy-access organizer compartment with plenty of room for accessories and interlocking zipper pulls for Notebook compartment
